author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mainichi Comnet to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
April 5 (Reuters) - Mainichi Comnet Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 600,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between April 20 and April 25
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 3,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/WYKTiW
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
